name: ACF REST API Extended
author: TanaponBB

sections.description: Extends WordPress REST API with ACF Options and GTM Tracking endpoints.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Ensure ACF is installed
sections.changelog:
1.3.2

  • Enhanced GTM Tracking with auto-registered ACF fields
  • Added ACF Options Page creation via code
  • Added support for additional tracking scripts field
  • Improved tracking code output with action hooks
  • Added helper methods: is_configured(), get_container_id()

1.3.1

  • New Implement for CSV Import

1.3.0

  • Added Tax Rates CRUD endpoints
  • Added Tax Rates batch operations
  • Added CSV import/export functionality
sections.faq:
Does this require ACF Pro?

No, works with both ACF Free and Pro.

upgrade_notice: Version 1.3.2 - Enhanced GTM Tracking with auto-registered ACF fields and improved tracking code injection.
